text:
Ms. Keusch's class decides to make rectangles for each of the whole numbers 1-30.

Drawing Instructions

  • Your teacher will assign your group some numbers between 1 and 30.
  • On the grid paper, draw all the rectangles whose area represents your assigned numbers.
  • On a large sheet of paper, attach and label the grid paper rectangles.
  • List all the factors from least to greatest at the bottom.

Example for the number 15:
